scripts.installb-mac: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.installb-win: cd backend && python -m venv venv && cd venv/Scripts && activate && cd ../.. && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.startb-win: cd backend && && cd venv/Scripts && activate && cd ../.. && venv/Script/gunicorn -w 4 app:app
